svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 2, 2024" date: "2024-11-02"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
* Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #145): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 :
testing going well Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec
Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec EIP7742 uncouple
blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee calculation but would
be asymmetric if target increased to 4 with max 6 blobs per block Symmetric blob base
fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
* Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well Mekong testnet : Pectra public
testnet live with devnet-4 spec Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still
finalizing spec EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to
blob base fee calculation but would be asymmetric if target increased to 4 with max 6
blobs per block Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade
with PeerDAS
* Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well
Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well
* Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec
Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec
* Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec
Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec
* EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee
calculation but would be asymmetric if target increased to 4 with max 6 blobs per
block Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee
block
* Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Weekly testing call #11 : fusaka-devnet-0 with EOF still ~1 week away
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
* PeerDAS breakout #11 : peerdas-devnet-3 died after a 100k slot reorg,
peerdas-devnet-4 planned for end of November, will rebase on Pectra
PeerDAS breakout #11 : peerdas-devnet-3 died after a 100k slot reorg, peerdas-devnet-4
planned for end of November, will rebase on Pectra
* EOF implementers call #61 : spec change discussions
EOF implementers call #61 : spec change discussions
Amsterdam upgrade
* Kaustinen-7 (Verkle testnet) live, use lodestar-quickstart to sync locally
Layer 1
* Terence: blob transactions in FOCIL (Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists) using
execution layer blob pool
Terence: blob transactions in FOCIL (Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists) using
* GossipSub potential improvements for large message handling
GossipSub potential improvements for large message handling
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client
scalability Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub publishing & IDONTWANT usage
* Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client scalability
Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client scalability
* Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub publishing & IDONTWANT usage
Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub publishing & IDONTWANT usage
For stakers
* Validator penalty simulator : visualize slashing & inactivity penalties on a single
validator
Validator penalty simulator : visualize slashing & inactivity penalties on a single
* Rocket Pool Saturn 0 upgrade : 8 ETH mini pools with no RPL required
Rocket Pool Saturn 0 upgrade : 8 ETH mini pools with no RPL required
Layer 2
* Base fault proofs live, to become a stage 1 rollup final step is using a security
council for upgrades
Base fault proofs live, to become a stage 1 rollup final step is using a security
* Blob burn simulator : visualize the impact of blob usage on ETH burn
Blob burn simulator : visualize the impact of blob usage on ETH burn
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7799 : System logs EIP7801 : eth/70 -
sharded blocks protocol EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential update request EIP7805 :
Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7799 : System logs
EIP7799 : System logs
* EIP7801 : eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol
EIP7801 : eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol
* EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential update request
EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential update request
* EIP7805 : Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
EIP7805 : Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7798 : Tap to pay ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface
ERC7803 : EIP712 extensions for account abstraction
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7798 : Tap to pay
ERC7798 : Tap to pay
* ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface
ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface
* ERC7803 : EIP712 extensions for account abstraction
Stuff for developers
* Argot collective : dev tools including Solidity & Sourcify spinning out of EF as a
non-profit with 5-10 years of funding
Argot collective : dev tools including Solidity & Sourcify spinning out of EF as a
* Vyper (language) security : audit coverage for key parts of codebase & ABI decoder
fuzzer
Vyper (language) security : audit coverage for key parts of codebase & ABI decoder
* Tornado Cash (rebuilt) : Foundry project with latest versions of Circom & snarkJS,
for educational purposes
Tornado Cash (rebuilt) : Foundry project with latest versions of Circom & snarkJS, for
educational purposes
* Swiss knife contract diff : compare verified contracts across chains using Etherscan
API v2
Swiss knife contract diff : compare verified contracts across chains using Etherscan
* Based agent : create AI agent using Coinbase developer platform & OpenAI
Based agent : create AI agent using Coinbase developer platform & OpenAI
* CTF: Bank challenge : sequence of 5 Solidity challenges using Foundry
CTF:
* Bank challenge : sequence of 5 Solidity challenges using Foundry
Security
* Security Alliance (SEAL) wargames drill scenario template
Ecosystem
* More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap: Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge)
: history expiry, state expiry and feature cleanup Fix everything else (the Splurge) :
EVM improvements, account abstraction, EIP1559 improvements, verifiable delay
functions (VDFs) and obfuscation + one-shot signatures
More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap:
* Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge) : history expiry, state expiry and feature
cleanup
Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge) : history expiry, state expiry and feature
* Fix everything else (the Splurge) : EVM improvements, account abstraction, EIP1559
improvements, verifiable delay functions (VDFs) and obfuscation + one-shot signatures
Fix everything else (the Splurge) : EVM improvements, account abstraction, EIP1559
* Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Merge & the Surge
Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Merge & the Surge
* ETHSydney hackathon projects
ETHSydney hackathon projects
Enterprise
* Shift4 enabling merchants to accept crypto , converted & settled in fiat, pilot Q4,
rollout 2025
Shift4 enabling merchants to accept crypto , converted & settled in fiat, pilot Q4,
* UBS asset management launches tokenized investment fund
UBS asset management launches tokenized investment fund
Job Listings
* Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.3 gwei 11.6k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
* 11.6k ETH net issuance this week
11.6k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,434 - $2,720, currently $2,514, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,434 - $2,720, currently $2,514, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.036 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.036 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* Synthetix proposal to acquire Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
Synthetix proposal to acquire Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
* Limit Break wrapped native : updated WETH deployable on EVM chains with same address
Limit Break wrapped native : updated WETH deployable on EVM chains with same address
* Tee_hee_he : AI agent on X run in TEE
Tee_hee_he : AI agent on X run in TEE
* Wallet security ranking : mobile & browser wallets evaluated against a checklist
Wallet security ranking : mobile & browser wallets evaluated against a checklist
Regulation/business/tokens
* Immutable received Wells notice from SEC
Immutable received Wells notice from SEC
* US Treasury: crypto & Treasury markets presentation , benefits/risks of tokenizing
Treasuries
US Treasury: crypto & Treasury markets presentation , benefits/risks of tokenizing
* Roman Storm trial moved to April
Roman Storm trial moved to April
* Temporary restraining order filed against Aragon for ANT redemption [Update: TRO
application withdrawn]
Temporary restraining order filed against Aragon for ANT redemption [Update: TRO
* Panama foundation vs Cayman-BVI explainer for token launches
Panama foundation vs Cayman-BVI explainer for token launches
* Layoffs: Consensys 20%, Kraken 15% & dYdX 35%
Layoffs: Consensys 20%, Kraken 15% & dYdX 35%
General
* Lottie player (JavaScript animation) supply chain attack injected wallet drainer
1inch amongst impacted projects
Lottie player (JavaScript animation) supply chain attack injected wallet drainer
* 1inch amongst impacted projects
* MrBeast onchain activity analyzed
MrBeast onchain activity analyzed
* M2 (UAE exchange) $13.7M stolen from hot wallets
M2 (UAE exchange) $13.7M stolen from hot wallets
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-2-2024

* Dec 4-5 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
